tool.name: Split
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**TIP:** If your data is not TAB delimited, use *Text Manipulation->Convert*
-----
This tools splits dataset random in 2 datasets (1/3 and 2/3 of the input data) This operation is useful to check the accuracy of classification algorithms.
**Example**
- Labels column must be an integer that indicates the index of the labels column. First column is 0 and you can use negative numbers to indicate last columns (-1 = last column).
- Input file must be tabular (separated by tabs) and well structured like::
id a b c d labels id1 1 9 2 0 label1 id2 5 2 4 2 label2 id3 2 3 5 1 label1
- Outputs:
- Data file (labels column = 5)::
id a b c d labels id1 1 9 2 0 label1 id2 5 2 4 2 label2 id3 2 3 5 1 label1
- label file::
label1 label2 label1
